title: Halwa Puri
description: Classic weekend breakfast combination of semolina pudding and fried bread.
steps: Roast semolina in ghee until golden
Add sugar syrup and cook until thick
Prepare puri dough with flour and water
Roll small circles and deep fry until puffed
Serve hot with halwa

title: Chana Cholay
description: Spicy chickpea curry served with fried bread or naan.
steps: Pressure cook chickpeas until tender
Sauté onions until golden brown
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes
Add spices and cooked chickpeas
Simmer for 15 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander

title: Aloo Paratha
description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced potato filling.
steps: Mash boiled potatoes with spices
Prepare dough with flour and water
Stuff dough with potato mixture
Roll out carefully
Cook on griddle with ghee until golden

title: Siri Paye
description: Slow-cooked trotters and head meat stew, a winter specialty.
steps: Clean and boil trotters for 3-4 hours
Prepare roux with wheat flour and oil
Add boiled trotters and spices
Simmer for another hour
Garnish with fresh ginger

title: Anda Paratha
description: Flaky paratha stuffed with spiced egg mixture.
steps: Prepare soft dough with flour and water
Whisk eggs with spices and onions
Roll out paratha, add egg mixture
Fold and cook on griddle with oil
Serve hot with yogurt

title: Nihari
description: Slow-cooked beef shank stew with aromatic spices.
ingredients: Fresh ginger and lemon for garnish
steps: Brown onions in oil and set aside
Sear beef with ginger-garlic paste
Add water and spices, simmer for 4-5 hours
Make slurry with wheat flour and mix in
Garnish with fried onions and ginger

title: Chai and Rusk
description: Classic Pakistani breakfast combination of milky tea and crisp rusks.
steps: Boil water with tea leaves and cardamom
Add milk and bring to boil
Simmer for 2-3 minutes
Strain and serve with rusks

title: Daal Chawal
description: Comforting lentil curry with steamed rice.
steps: Cook lentils with turmeric until soft
Temper with cumin, onions and tomatoes
Season with salt and chili
Serve hot with steamed rice

title: Kashmiri Chai
description: Pink salted tea with nuts, a Kashmir valley specialty.
steps: Boil tea leaves with baking soda for 15 mins
Add milk and simmer until pink color develops
Add salt to taste
Top with chopped nuts

title: Masala Omelette
description: Fluffy eggs with onions, tomatoes and green chilies.
steps: Beat eggs with all ingredients
Heat oil in pan
Pour egg mixture and cook on medium heat
Fold and serve hot with bread

title: Chicken Biryani
description: Fragrant basmati rice layered with spiced chicken and aromatic spices.
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt, biryani masala, and turmeric for 2 hours
Soak rice for 30 minutes then parboil
In heavy pot, layer rice, chicken, mint, coriander and fried onions
Seal with dough or foil and cook on low heat (dum) for 30 minutes
Mix gently before serving with raita

title: Beef Pulao
description: Aromatic rice cooked with tender beef chunks and whole spices.
steps: Brown beef cubes in oil and set aside
In same pot, sauté onions until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes
Return beef to pot with all spices
Add rice and stock, bring to boil
Cover and simmer until liquid is absorbed
Let stand covered for 10 minutes before serving

title: Chicken Karahi
description: Spicy tomato-based curry cooked in traditional wok (karahi).
steps: Heat oil in karahi, add cumin seeds
Add chicken and brown on high heat
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes
Cook until oil separates
Add all spices and 1 cup water
Simmer until chicken is tender
Garnish with fresh coriander and green chilies

title: Daal Chawal
description: Classic comfort food - lentil curry with steamed rice.
steps: Pressure cook lentils with turmeric until soft
In separate pan, heat ghee and temper cumin seeds
Add onions and sauté until golden
Add tomatoes and green chili
Mix in cooked lentils and simmer for 10 minutes
Serve hot with steamed rice and pickle

title: Beef Nihari
description: Slow-cooked beef shank stew with aromatic spices.
steps: Brown onions in oil and set aside
Sear beef with ginger-garlic paste
Add water and spices, simmer for 4-5 hours
Make slurry with wheat flour and mix in
Cook until thickened
Garnish with fried onions, ginger and lemon

title: Aloo Gosht
description: Hearty meat and potato curry with rich gravy.
steps: Heat oil and brown meat pieces
Add onions and sauté until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes
Add all spices and 2 cups water
Simmer until meat is half done
Add potatoes and cook until tender
Garnish with fresh coriander

title: Chana Masala
description: Spicy chickpea curry with authentic Punjabi flavors.
steps: Pressure cook chickpeas until tender
Heat oil and temper cumin seeds
Add onions and sauté until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomato puree
Add all spices and cooked chickpeas
Simmer for 15 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander and sliced onions

title: Fish Curry
description: Coastal-style fish in spicy tomato gravy.
steps: Marinate fish with salt and turmeric for 15 minutes
Heat oil and sauté onion paste until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomato puree
Add all spices and cook until oil separates
Add 1 cup water and bring to boil
Gently add fish pieces and simmer for 10 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander

title: Vegetable Pulao
description: Fragrant rice with mixed vegetables and whole spices.
steps: Soak rice for 30 minutes then drain
Heat oil and temper whole spices
Add onions and sauté until golden
Add vegetables and sauté for 5 minutes
Add rice and water with garam masala
Cook covered until water is absorbed
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving

title: Mutton Korma
description: Rich and creamy mutton curry with yogurt and nuts.
steps: Marinate mutton with yogurt for 1 hour
Heat oil and sauté onion paste until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and mutton
Add all spices and cook on high heat
Add 2 cups water and simmer until tender
Add almond paste and cook for 10 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander

title: Mango Lassi
description: Creamy yogurt drink with sweet mango pulp, a summer favorite.
steps: Combine mango pulp, yogurt, milk and sugar in blender
Add cardamom powder and ice cubes if using
Blend until smooth and frothy
Pour into glasses
Garnish with chopped pistachios
Serve chilled

title: Rooh Afza Sharbat
description: Traditional rose-flavored summer cooler with milky notes.
steps: Add Rooh Afza syrup to glass
Pour cold milk or water and mix well
Add lemon juice and chaat masala if using
Add ice cubes
Soak basil seeds in water for 10 mins if using
Garnish with soaked basil seeds
Serve immediately

title: Sugarcane Juice (Ganne ka Ras)
description: Freshly extracted sweet sugarcane juice with mint and lemon.
steps: Peel and cut sugarcane into small pieces
Extract juice using sugarcane machine
Add lemon juice, black salt and chaat masala
Pour over ice cubes
Garnish with mint leaves
Serve fresh (best consumed immediately)

title: Kashmiri Chai (Pink Tea)
description: Traditional salted pink tea with nuts from Kashmir.
steps: Boil water with tea leaves and baking soda for 15 mins
Add milk and simmer until pink color develops
Add salt and sugar (if using)
Beat with ladle to create froth
Strain into cups
Top with chopped nuts and cardamom
Serve hot

title: Lemonade (Nimbu Pani)
description: Refreshing homemade lemonade with Indian spices.
steps: Mix lemon juice and sugar until dissolved
Add water and stir well
Add black salt and cumin powder
Add ice cubes
Garnish with mint leaves
Serve chilled

title: Badam Milk
description: Creamy almond milk with saffron and cardamom.
steps: Peel soaked almonds and grind with 1/2 cup milk
Boil remaining milk in heavy pan
Add almond paste and simmer for 10 mins
Add sugar, cardamom and saffron
Stir continuously to prevent sticking
Garnish with chopped pistachios
Serve warm or chilled

title: Ginger Tea (Adrak Chai)
description: Strong black tea with fresh ginger, perfect for winters.
steps: Boil water with crushed ginger
Add tea leaves and boil for 2 mins
Add milk and bring to boil
Simmer for 3-4 minutes
Add sugar to taste
Strain into cups
Serve hot

title: Sattu Sharbat
description: Traditional Punjabi roasted gram flour drink.
steps: Mix sattu with little water to make paste
Add remaining water and mix well
Add lemon juice and spices
Add ice cubes and mint leaves
Stir well before drinking
Serve chilled

title: Falsa Juice
description: Tangy-sweet summer berry drink with black salt.
steps: Wash and mash falsa berries
Strain through sieve to extract juice
Add water and sugar, mix well
Add black salt and chaat masala
Pour over ice cubes
Garnish with mint
Serve chilled

title: Masala Soda
description: Fizzy spiced soda drink, a street food favorite.
steps: Rub lemon rim of glass with black salt
Add ice cubes to glass
Pour soda water
Add all spices and sugar
Squeeze lemon juice
Garnish with mint
Serve immediately

title: Samosas
description: Crispy fried pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas.
steps: Make dough with flour, salt and 2 tbsp oil
For filling, sauté cumin, add peas and mashed potatoes
Add all spices and mix well
Roll dough into thin circles, cut in half
Form cones and fill with potato mixture
Seal edges with water
Deep fry until golden brown
Serve hot with mint chutney

title: Pakoras
description: Crispy fritters made with gram flour and vegetables.
steps: Mix gram flour with all spices and baking soda
Add vegetables and mix well
Add water gradually to make thick batter
Heat oil in deep pan
Drop spoonfuls of batter into hot oil
Fry until golden and crispy
Drain on paper towels
Serve hot with tamarind chutney

title: Dahi Bhallay
description: Soft lentil dumplings in creamy yogurt with chutneys.
steps: Grind soaked dal to smooth paste
Whip until fluffy and add pinch of baking soda
Make small balls and deep fry until golden
Soak in warm water for 15 minutes then squeeze
Arrange in serving dish
Top with beaten yogurt
Drizzle both chutneys
Sprinkle spices and sev

title: Chana Chaat
description: Tangy and spicy chickpea salad with fresh vegetables.
steps: Combine all vegetables and chickpeas in bowl
Add yogurt and mix gently
Add both chutneys
Sprinkle all spices
Garnish with coriander and sev
Serve immediately

title: Aloo Tikki
description: Crispy potato patties served with chutneys.
steps: Mix mashed potatoes with all ingredients except oil
Make small round patties
Coat lightly with breadcrumbs
Shallow fry until golden brown on both sides
Serve hot with mint and tamarind chutney

title: Spring Rolls
description: Crispy rolls filled with vegetables and noodles.
steps: Sauté all vegetables for 2 minutes
Add noodles and seasonings
Cool the filling completely
Place filling on wrappers and roll tightly
Seal edges with cornflour slurry
Deep fry until golden and crispy
Serve with sweet chili sauce

title: Chicken Roll
description: Flaky paratha wrapped around spicy chicken filling.
steps: Make paratha dough and roll out thin circles
Cook on griddle with little oil
For filling, sauté chicken with all spices
Spread mayonnaise on paratha
Place chicken filling and roll tightly
Dip in beaten egg and shallow fry
Cut into pieces and serve

title: Fruit Chaat
description: Colorful fruit salad with chaat masala twist.
steps: Combine all fruits in large bowl
Add lemon juice immediately to prevent browning
Sprinkle chaat masala and black salt
Toss gently to mix
Garnish with mint leaves
Serve chilled

title: Bun Kabab
description: Spicy patty burger with chutneys in soft bun.
steps: Mix minced meat with all ingredients except buns
Make patties and shallow fry
Toast buns lightly
Spread both chutneys on buns
Place patty and onion slices
Serve immediately

title: Jalebi
description: Crispy orange swirls soaked in sugar syrup.
steps: Make sugar syrup with cardamom and keep warm
Mix all dry ingredients for batter
Add yogurt and make flowing consistency batter
Ferment for 30 minutes
Fill piping bag with batter
Pipe swirls into hot oil
Fry until crispy then dip in syrup
Serve warm

title: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft golden dumplings soaked in fragrant sugar syrup.
steps: Make sugar syrup with cardamom and rose water
Mix dry ingredients for dough
Add ghee and milk to form soft dough
Shape into smooth balls without cracks
Fry on low heat until golden brown
Soak in warm syrup for 2 hours
Serve warm or at room temperature

title: Gajar ka Halwa
description: Rich carrot pudding cooked in milk and dry fruits.
steps: Cook grated carrots in milk until thick
Add ghee and cook until carrots soften
Add sugar and cook until moisture evaporates
Mix in khoya and dry fruits
Garnish with more nuts and silver leaf
Serve warm with vanilla ice cream

title: Kheer (Rice Pudding)
description: Creamy rice pudding flavored with cardamom and saffron.
steps: Soak rice for 30 minutes then drain
Boil milk in heavy-bottomed pan
Add rice and simmer until soft
Add sugar and cook until thickened
Add cardamom, saffron and nuts
Finish with rose water
Chill before serving

title: Jalebi
description: Crispy orange swirls soaked in sugar syrup.
steps: Make sugar syrup with cardamom
Mix dry ingredients for batter
Add yogurt to make flowing consistency
Ferment for 30 minutes
Pipe swirls into hot oil
Fry until crispy then dip in syrup
Serve warm

title: Ras Malai
description: Soft cheese patties in sweetened, flavored milk.
steps: Make chenna by curdling milk with lemon juice
Knead into smooth dough
Shape into flat discs
Boil in sugar syrup until puffed
Prepare rabri by reducing milk with sugar
Soak chenna discs in rabri
Garnish with saffron and nuts
Chill before serving

title: Shahi Tukray
description: Royal bread pudding with rich creamy sauce.
ingredients: Silver leaf and chopped nuts for garnish
steps: Cut bread into triangles
Shallow fry in ghee until golden
Reduce milk with sugar until thick
Add cardamom and saffron
Dip bread pieces in milk mixture
Layer in dish and pour remaining milk
Garnish with silver leaf and nuts
Serve chilled

title: Sohan Halwa
description: Traditional dense sweet from Multan with nuts.
steps: Make sugar syrup and keep warm
Mix cornflour with water to make slurry
Cook in ghee until thick and translucent
Add sugar syrup gradually
Cook until mixture leaves sides of pan
Add nuts and cardamom
Pour in greased tray and cut when cool

title: Firni
description: Ground rice pudding with delicate flavors.
steps: Grind soaked rice to coarse paste
Boil milk in heavy pan
Add rice paste and cook until thick
Add sugar and cook further
Add cardamom and saffron
Pour in earthen pots if available
Garnish with nuts and rose water
Chill before serving

title: Zarda (Sweet Rice)
description: Fragrant yellow sweet rice with nuts and raisins.
steps: Soak rice for 30 minutes then parboil
Heat ghee and whole spices
Add sugar and color dissolved in water
Layer rice and cook on dum
Add nuts and raisins
Finish with rose water
Serve warm

title: Kulfi (Traditional Ice Cream)
description: Creamy frozen dessert with cardamom and pistachios.
steps: Reduce milk to half its volume
Add condensed milk and milk powder
Cook until very thick
Add cardamom and nuts
Cool completely then add rose water
Pour into kulfi molds
Freeze for at least 6 hours
Dip molds in warm water to unmold

title: Chicken Karahi
description: Classic Pakistani chicken cooked in a wok with tomatoes and spices.
steps: Heat oil in karahi and add cumin seeds
Add chicken and cook on high heat until color changes
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for 2 minutes
Add tomatoes and all dry spices
Cook on medium heat until oil separates
Add 1/2 cup water and simmer until chicken is tender
Garnish with fresh coriander and ginger juliennes
Serve hot with naan or roti

title: Beef Karahi
description: Rich and flavorful beef cooked in traditional karahi style.
steps: Pressure cook beef with salt and turmeric until tender
Heat oil in karahi and sauté onions until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1 minute
Add tomato puree and cook until oil separates
Add cooked beef and all spices
Cook on high heat for 5-7 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander and green chili
Serve with tandoori roti

title: Mutton Karahi
description: Tender mutton cooked with traditional karahi spices.
steps: Pressure cook mutton with salt and turmeric until tender
Heat oil in karahi and sauté onions until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1 minute
Add tomatoes and cook until soft
Add cooked mutton and all spices
Whisk yogurt and add to karahi
Cook on high heat for 10 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander
Serve hot with naan

title: Kadai Chicken
description: Restaurant-style chicken karahi with bell peppers.
steps: Heat oil in karahi and sauté chicken until color changes
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes
Add tomatoes and all spices except karahi masala
Cook until oil separates
Add capsicum and karahi masala
Cook on high heat for 5 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander and ginger
Serve hot with naan

title: White Karahi
description: Creamy white chicken karahi without tomatoes.
steps: Heat oil in karahi and sauté chicken until color changes
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes
Whisk yogurt with all spices and add to karahi
Cook on medium heat until chicken is tender
Add fresh cream and cook for 2 more minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander and green chili
Serve hot with tandoori roti

title: Peshawari Karahi
description: Traditional karahi from Peshawar with minimal spices.
steps: Heat oil in karahi and sauté meat until color changes
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes
Add tomatoes and cook until oil separates
Add black pepper and salt
Cook on high heat for 10 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander and green chili
Serve hot with naan

title: Charsi Karahi
description: Specialty from Peshawar's Charsi Tikka shops.
steps: Heat oil in karahi and sauté meat until color changes
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes
Add tomatoes and cook until oil separates
Add black pepper and salt
Cook on high heat until meat is tender
Garnish with fresh coriander and green chili
Serve with lemon wedges and naan

title: Fish Karahi
description: Flaky fish cooked in spicy karahi gravy.
steps: Marinate fish with salt and turmeric for 15 minutes
Heat oil in karahi and sauté onions until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1 minute
Add tomatoes and all spices
Cook until oil separates
Gently add fish pieces and simmer for 10 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander
Serve with lemon wedges and naan

title: Vegetable Karahi
description: Hearty mix of vegetables in spicy karahi gravy.
steps: Parboil vegetables until half cooked
Heat oil in karahi and sauté onions until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1 minute
Add tomatoes and all spices
Cook until oil separates
Add vegetables and cook for 10 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander
Serve hot with naan

title: Paneer Karahi
description: Cottage cheese cubes in rich karahi gravy.
steps: Lightly fry paneer cubes and set aside
Heat oil in karahi and sauté onions until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1 minute
Add tomatoes and all spices
Cook until oil separates
Add paneer cubes and cook for 5 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander and green chili
Serve hot with naan

title: Seekh Kabab
description: Spiced minced meat skewers grilled to perfection.
steps: Mix all ingredients thoroughly in a bowl
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour
Wet hands and mold mixture onto skewers
Grill on medium heat for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally
Baste with oil while grilling
Serve hot with mint chutney and naan

title: Chicken Tikka
description: Marinated chicken pieces grilled on skewers.
steps: Make deep cuts in chicken pieces
Mix all marinade ingredients in a bowl
Add chicken and coat well
Marinate for at least 2 hours (overnight best)
Thread onto skewers
Grill on medium heat for 10-12 minutes
Baste with oil while grilling
Serve with onion rings and lemon wedges

title: Bihari Kabab
description: Tender beef strips marinated in special spices.
steps: Make deep cuts in beef strips
Grind poppy seeds to powder
Mix all marinade ingredients
Marinate beef for at least 4 hours (overnight best)
Thread onto skewers
Grill on medium heat for 8-10 minutes
Baste with oil while grilling
Serve with naan and raita

title: Malai Boti
description: Creamy marinated chicken grilled to perfection.
steps: Make deep cuts in chicken pieces
Mix all marinade ingredients except butter
Marinate chicken for at least 2 hours
Thread onto skewers
Grill on medium heat for 10-12 minutes
Baste with butter while grilling
Serve hot with garlic sauce

title: Reshmi Kabab
description: Silky smooth chicken kababs with delicate flavors.
steps: Mix all ingredients except butter
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour
Wet hands and mold onto skewers
Grill on medium heat for 8-10 minutes
Baste with butter while grilling
Serve with mint yogurt dip

title: Tandoori Chicken
description: Classic whole chicken marinated in yogurt and spices.
steps: Make deep cuts in chicken pieces
Mix all marinade ingredients
Coat chicken thoroughly
Marinate for at least 3 hours (overnight best)
Grill on medium heat for 20-25 minutes
Baste with oil while grilling
Serve with onion rings and lemon wedges

title: Fish Tikka
description: Marinated fish pieces grilled on skewers.
ingredients: 1 kg firm fish fillets (cut into cubes)
steps: Pat dry fish pieces
Mix all marinade ingredients
Coat fish gently
Marinate for 30 minutes
Thread onto skewers
Grill on medium heat for 6-8 minutes
Baste with oil while grilling
Serve with mint chutney

title: Peshawari Chapli Kabab
description: Spiced beef patties from Peshawar.
steps: Mix all ingredients thoroughly
Make flat round patties
Heat oil in pan or grill
Cook on medium heat for 5-7 minutes per side
Press gently while cooking
Serve hot with naan and salad

title: Hariyali Kabab
description: Green herb-marinated chicken kababs.
steps: Blend coriander, mint and green chilies to paste
Mix with all other ingredients
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour
Shape into flat kababs
Grill on medium heat for 8-10 minutes
Baste with oil while grilling
Serve with tamarind chutney

title: Beef Shashlik
description: Beef and vegetable skewers with flavorful marinade.
steps: Mix all marinade ingredients
Add beef and marinate for 1 hour
Thread beef and vegetables alternately on skewers
Grill on medium heat for 10-12 minutes
Baste with oil while grilling
Serve with garlic sauce
